item.title: Pain trades include the dollar, the Magnificent Seven and 10-year bond yields: strategist
item.description: Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett sees renewed dollar selling and thinks bond traders would be confounded by 10-year yields at 4%.

item.title: U.S. factory sector contracts for 5th straight month in July, ISM shows
item.description: “The dominant theme remains tariffs,” the ISM notes.

item.description: ‘Wednesday’ and ‘Peacemaker’ return, while ‘Alien: Earth’ lands and ‘King of the Hill’ gets revived

item.title: ‘I have never been asked for money before’: My friend wants to borrow $1,600 to pay her rent. Do I say yes?
item.description: “I have heard mixed reviews on lending people money.”

item.title: Amazon’s stock is falling, as this trend from earnings has investors worried
item.description: AWS didn’t see the same growth acceleration as its cloud rivals, raising questions about the returns on Amazon’s high AI spending.
